Name: Blue Agave
SeedDescription: Plant these in summer. Takes 12 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas en verano. Tardan 12 en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Sommer. Wächst in 12 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: À planter en été. Prend 12 jours pour arriver à maturité.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket nyáron ültesd el. 12 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 夏植えの作物。そだつのに12日かかる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as no verão. Leva 12 dias para amadurecer.
